verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: likes] [ARG1: to tell a story about the U.S. paying out billions of dollars to Iran as part of the multinational deal freezing its nuclear program]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] likes to [V: tell] [ARG1: a story about the U.S. paying out billions of dollars to Iran as part of the multinational deal freezing its nuclear program]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump likes to tell a story about [ARG0: the U.S.] [V: paying] out [ARG1: billions of dollars] [ARG2: to Iran] [ARGM-PRD: as part of the multinational deal freezing its nuclear program]

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump likes to tell a story about the U.S. paying out billions of dollars to Iran as part of [ARG0: the multinational deal] [V: freezing] [ARG1: its nuclear program]
